title: Game Crashing After Launcher
body:
I run the launcher as admin, hit launch, and I get a blacked out window and a prompt saying "lolclient.exe has stopped working". I've tried reinstalling the game, repairing the client from the launcher, and deleting files to force the launcher to reupdate the game, but I get the same result everytime.

Further information on my build in case it's relevant,
Windows 10
i5-4670k, Hyper 212 EVO
Asus z87m-Plus
Crucial Ballistix Sport 2x8 gb ram
500 gb 850 evo
Sapphire Tri-X R9 280x

Anyone else getting this problem, and anyone have any suggestions or solutions?

EDIT:
I have solved my problem. RivaTunerStatisticsServer was conflicting with the launcher for some reason. Closing RTSS before launching the game solves the issue.

replies.body:
It sounds like your client is both having a hard time finding a stable connection to the servers and then disconnecting from the platform entirely, causing the crash you experience. This is often caused by either problematic local network configurations or poor routing to the servers. Our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) addresses the most common solutions. 

If you continue to have this issue after working through those steps, please let me know.

I tried out some of the suggestions (firewall exceptions and DNS configuration, in particular), but they did not work.  Thanks for the suggestions, but I have a hunch that my wireless connection is not the issue.
